title: poottaittirappadu
sahitya:
pUTTai tirappadu kaiyAlE  nalla manattirappadu matiyAlE
anupallavi  pAttai tirappadu paNNAlE inba vITTai tirappadu peNNAlE
caraNam 1 Ettai tuDaippadu kaiyAlE mana vITTai tuDaippadu meyyAlE
vETTai aDippadu villAlE anbuk-kOTTai piDippadu shollAlE
   caraNam 2  kATrai aDaippadu manadAlE indak-kAyattai kAppadu sheigaiyAlE
shOTraip-pushippadu vAyAlE uyir tuNivuruvadu nAyAlE
